title: Biden Betrayed the World | Guests: Ric Grenell & Rep. Loudermilk | 8/25/21
description:
Glenn broadcasts from an undisclosed location in the Middle East as the Nazarene Fund’s rescue mission continues. Rep. Barry Loudermilk joins with his perspective that Biden has practically sided with our enemies. Former ambassador Richard Grenell calls in to argue that the Afghanistan debacle isn’t an intelligence failure. Oklahoma mom Allyson Reneau returns with an update on the female judges she’s trying to get out of Afghanistan. Glenn asks leftist civil rights organizations and Silicon Valley why they’re so silent. The White House is now touting its withdrawal as a “success.” Rep. Chris Stewart joins to describe just how “historic” this failure is and a possible Havana syndrome attack near VP Kamala Harris.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
